model.name: TTS KugelAudio 0 Open 7B
model.description: KugelAudio open-source text-to-speech with optional voice cloning. You can create a dialogue between two people by providing two audio sources and by starting lines alternatively with 'Speaker 0: ' or 'Speaker 1: '. You may observe Accelerated Speech with long speeches, use Manual Split (one empty line) or Auto Split to avoid this effect.

prompt: Hello! This is KugelAudio speaking in a clear, friendly voice.
